ignored_extensions.title: A list of appids of extensions which should not be checked for updates.
ignored_extensions.description: Appids which are not installed will simply be ignored, it is safe to add them here.

auto_update.title: Enable automatic updates in extension options.

check_store_apps.title: Enable updates for Chrome Web Store extensions in extension options.

check_external_apps.title: Enable updates for non-Chrome Web Store extensions in extension options.

manually_install.title: Manually install extensions.
manually_install.description: Default value is false, set to true if not using ungoogled chromium
